message: "Hey doc, just took 5 units of Novolog before my eggs and toast. Shot it up in my thigh. Hope I got the timing right, life's been hectic lately."

"Hey doc, just took my metformin with my toast this morn. No side effects so far. Hopefully this keeps up. Sometimes life gets in the way, ya know? 😅"

Your chatbot response:
"Hi there! I'm glad to hear that you've taken your metformin with your breakfast and that you're not experiencing any side effects at the moment. It's important to stay consistent with your medication regimen,
